name: Coils of the First Spider
flavorText: It is claimed that Arachyr was able to restore the vital life essence of his followers by using creatures spawned from the realm that lies between our world and the Unformed Land.
flavorTextHtml: It is claimed that Arachyr was able to restore the vital life essence of his followers by using creatures spawned from the realm that lies between our world and the Unformed Land.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: While channeling Firebats, you gain 30% damage reduction and 71,752 Life per Hit. (Witch Doctor Only) [60,000 - 80,000]
